titles.title: To establish the Flag Office Revolving Fund for services provided by the Flag Office of the Architect of the Capitol.
To establish the Flag Office Revolving Fund for services provided by the Flag Office of the Architect of the Capitol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This bill establishes a Flag Office Revolving Fund for the Architect of the Capitol to use for expenses in connection with services provided by the Flag Office, including: (1) supplies, inventories, equipment, and other expenses; and (2) reimbursement of any appropriations account for the salaries of employees of the Flag Office.
